attributes.action: Stop the Planned Switch off of National FM Radio in 2015.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Millions of people listen to national FM radio stations for news and entertainment. The proposed alternative of DAB radio is expensive and unreliable, especially for those using a radio in their car. The proposed switch of in just six years time is unnecessary, unwise and unwanted.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
